The Week Ahead at the United Nations
====================================

### **21 June - 27 June 2025**

**(Please note that this is a working document and is subject to change)**

To find out which events will be webcast, see: [https://media.un.org/en/webtv/schedule](https://media.un.org/en/webtv/schedule)

You can also consult the [Media Accreditation and Liaison Unit (MALU) Media Alert](https://www.un.org/sg/www.un.org/en/media/accreditation/alert.shtml), [the UN Journal](https://www.un.org/sg/journal.un.org/en/new-york/all/2022-05-19),the websites of the [UN Security Council](https://www.un.org/sg/www.un.org/securitycouncil/)and the [General Assembly](https://www.un.org/sg/www.un.org/en/ga/) to find the latest information.

### **Saturday, 21 June**

### Today is [International Day of Yoga](https://www.un.org/en/observances/yoga-day), it is also [International Day of the Celebration of the Solstice](https://www.un.org/en/observances/solstice-day).

### **Sunday, 22 June**

There are no events scheduled for today.

### **Monday, 23 June**

Today is [United Nations Public Service Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/public-service-day), it is also [International Widows’ Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/widows-day).

This morning, the [Security Council](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/sites/www.un.org.securitycouncil/files/programme_of_work.pdf) is scheduled to hold an open briefing on [the United Nations Assistance Mission in Afghanistan (UNAMA) followed by consultations.](https://unama.unmissions.org/)

At 10:00 a.m., the presentation of the zero draft of the Pact for the Future will take place in the Trusteeship Council Chamber. It will be broadcast live on [UN Web TV.](https://webtv.un.org/en/asset/k13/k131jwybc8)

At noon, the Spokesperson for the Secretary-General will hold a press briefing, broadcast live on[UN Web TV](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/#_blank).

Noon briefing guest is Deputy Secretary-General, Amina J. Mohammed, along with Ambassador Héctor Gómez Hernández, the Permanent Representative of Spain to the United Nations and Ambassador Chola Milambo, the Permanent Representative of Zambia to the United Nations. They will brief reporters on expectations for the upcoming Fourth International Conference on Financing for Development.

From 23 to 25 June, the 2025 UN Public Service Forum will take place in Samarkand, Uzbekistan, under the theme: “Five Years to 2030: Accelerating Public Service Delivery for a Sustainable Future.”

From 23 to 27 June, the 20th annual Internet Governance Forum (IGF) will take place at NOVA Spektrum in Lillestrøm, Norway, hosted by the Government of Norway.

### **Tuesday, 24 June**

Today is [International Day of Women in Diplomacy](https://www.un.org/en/observances/women-in-diplomacy-day).

This morning, the [Security Council](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/sites/www.un.org.securitycouncil/files/programme_of_work.pdf) is scheduled to hold a briefing on the [United Nations Support Mission in Libya this will be followed by consultations.](https://unsmil.unmissions.org/) In the afternoon there will be a briefing on non-proliferation.

At noon, the Spokesperson for the Secretary-General will hold a press briefing, broadcast live on[UN Web TV](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/#_blank). This will be followed by a briefing by the Spokesperson for the President of the General Assembly. 

Noon Briefing will be Jorge Moreira da Silva, United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS)Executive Director. He will brief reporters virtually on his trip to Myanmar.

From 24 to 26 June, the Eighth Meeting of the UN Committee of Experts on Business and Trade Statistics will take place in Singapore.

In Geneva, the UN Information Service will hold its bi-week ly briefing for journalists.

### **Wednesday, 25 June**

### Today is the [Day of the Seafarer 2025](https://www.imo.org/en/About/Events/Pages/Day-of-the-Seafarer-2025.aspx).
This morning, the [Security Council](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/sites/www.un.org.securitycouncil/files/programme_of_work.pdf) is scheduled to hold an open debate on Children and Armed Conflict.

At 10:00 a.m., there will be a Plenary Meeting of the General Assembly on the Responsibility to Protect and the Prevention of Genocide, War Crimes, Ethnic Cleansing and Crimes Against Humanity. The Secretary-General will deliver remarks.

At noon, the Spokesperson for the Secretary-General will hold a press briefing, broadcast live on[UN Web TV](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/#_blank).

### **Thursday, 26 June**

Today is [International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-drug-abuse-day), it is also [International Day in Support of Victims of Torture](https://www.un.org/en/observances/torture-victims-day).

This morning, the [Security Council](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/sites/www.un.org.securitycouncil/files/programme_of_work.pdf) is scheduled to hold a briefing [the United Nations Multidimensional Integrated Stabilization Mission in the Central African Republic (MINUSCA),](https://peacekeeping.un.org/en/mission/minusca) followed by consultations.

At 10:00 a.m., there will be Plenary Meeting of the General Assembly to observe the 80 th Anniversary of the Signing of the Charter of the UN. The Secretary-General is expected to deliver remarks.

At noon, the Spokesperson for the Secretary-General will hold a press briefing, broadcast live on[UN Web TV](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/#_blank).

### **Friday, 27 June**

Today is [Micro-, Small and Medium-sized Enterprises Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/micro-small-medium-businesses-day), it is also [International Day of Deafblindness](https://www.un.org/en/observances/international-days-and-weeks).

This morning, the [Security Council](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/sites/www.un.org.securitycouncil/files/programme_of_work.pdf) is scheduled to hold a briefing on Sudan followed by consultations, and in the afternoon is scheduled to have a briefing[United Nations Organization Stabilization Mission in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (MONUSCO),](https://peacekeeping.un.org/en/mission/monusco) followed by consultations.

At noon, the Spokesperson for the Secretary-General will hold a press briefing, broadcast live on[UN Web TV](https://www.un.org/securitycouncil/#_blank). This will be followed by a briefing by the Spokesperson for the President of the General Assembly.

In Geneva, the UN Information Service will hold its bi-week ly briefing for journalists.
